features.name: App Shell & Layout
features.description: Main application shell with navigation, user menu, and layout components

features.name: LinkedIn Import Wizard
features.description: Step-by-step wizard for connecting LinkedIn account and importing profile data

features.name: Profile Overview
features.description: Display user profile with personal info, work experience, education, and skills

features.name: Resume Editor
features.description: Interactive resume editor with AI optimization suggestions

features.name: Resume Preview & Download
features.description: Preview and download resume in multiple formats (PDF, DOCX)

features.name: Job Discovery & Listing
features.description: Browse and search jobs with AI-powered match scores and filtering

features.name: Job Detail & Matching
features.description: View detailed job information with compatibility analysis and skill gap assessment

features.name: Application Generator
features.description: AI-powered generation of tailored resumes and cover letters for specific jobs

features.name: Application Tracker
features.description: Track job applications with status management, follow-ups, and analytics

features.name: Account Settings
features.description: Manage user profile, security settings, notifications, and privacy preferences

features.name: Subscription & Billing
features.description: Manage subscription plans (Basic/Premium), payment methods, and billing history

features.name: Utilities & Helpers
features.description: Common utility functions and helpers for styling and data manipulation
